title: Update xplat to use Roslyn compiler
body: Currently using the mono C# compiler. Tasks/Targets need to be updated to use Roslyn.

nodes.body: This probably should be an option until the new debug format becomes available, as currently Roslyn does not produce debug symbols on Unix (or when Portable PDB gets merged, there are yet no consumers for it)
@migueldeicaza good point. Suggestions welcome on the name.  My immediate reaction was to make it `/p:Compiler=Mono`
Removed the CoreCLR label since the .NET Core build does use Roslyn
